definition: tranquil and even-tempered (idiom); calmly and without stress
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Soothe your soul and your hair with calming techniques.
sentences.chinese: 心平氣和的撫慰你的靈魂和頭髮。

sentences.english: You'd better reason things out with him calmly.
sentences.chinese: 你最好心平氣和地同他講理。

sentences.english: Then you very calmly, yet authoritatively say "Stop."
sentences.chinese: 接着你非常心平氣和地卻又命令式地說“停下”。

sentences.english: The more abusive the businessman became, the calmer the porter seemed.
sentences.chinese: 商人越是無理，搬運工卻顯得越加心平氣和。

sentences.english: When their children misbehaved, they dealt with them calmly.
sentences.chinese: 當他們的孩子做錯事時，他們心平氣和地對待他們。

sentences.english: Excuse me, Andy. Could we just discuss this calmly and civilly?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，安狄。我們能不能心平氣和地談一談？

sentences.english: He is a calm and reasonable man.
sentences.chinese: 他是個心平氣和而講理的人。

sentences.english: But he added that the vast majority of demonstrators were good-humoured.
sentences.chinese: 但他補充說大部分的抗議者都是心平氣和的。

sentences.english: She was very calm, quiet and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 她鎮定自若，心平氣和且很友好。

sentences.english: People often report feeling calmer after listening to calming music.
sentences.chinese: 人們總是覺得在聽過舒緩的音樂後感到自己心平氣和。

sentences.english: But I fended off the taunts and jibes of the family good humouredly.
sentences.chinese: 但我心平氣和地頂住了家人的嘲笑和奚落。

sentences.english: Natasha could not see him in such a piteous plight without emotion.
sentences.chinese: 娜塔莎不能心平氣和地望見他那副慘樣子。

sentences.english: Let's sit down and have a calm and sensible talk.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們心平氣和地坐下來談一談。
